comments.comment: Hello Major General, please do not play political games at the expense of forces. People of this country always respect those who fought for the motherland. What you are doing is disgraceful to the uniform, you used to wear. You are simply promoting Mahinda, Gota and regime for selfish gains by hiding under the uniform and war success. We are all aware about few soldiers who committed crimes hiding under the uniform to satisfy the former regime. Killing defenceless prisoners and journalists is not fighting wars but heinous crimes. You are simply trying to protect those soldier bastards by hiding them under real soldiers.
comments.author: Kasun Weliwita

replies.replyComment: I had my faith on "Yahapalana" only for few months after 8th January 2015. However, Mr.President Sirisena has proved beyond any doubt that he and his family is the worst. Bringing Mahinda or Gota back will pave the way for Rajapakshe Dynasty to establish complete dictatorship to make SL another Zimbabwe. Today more than anything, we need to establish law and order with independent judiciary which will not listen to dirty politicians. Therefore, now I am waiting for next presidential election to support Mr. Nagananda Kodithuwakku, (presidential candidate for 2020), a promising lawyer, to clean up the mess and steer my mother land back to its former glory.
So who else should come and develop this country again? U have any recommendation? Or r u fine with this good governance who trying to hand over our nation to ltte diaspora?

Rajitha is a utterly corrupt dirty politician. I do not want to waste my time talking about Rajitha. Prabha is the worst inhuman bastard ever lived on this planet. That does not mean what Mahinda, Gota and their family members did after the war is correct. Winning the war is great, we are thankful for that similarly taking law into their hand and killing defenceless prisoners, journalists, rugger players, stealing billions of public funds and using soldiers for extorsion etc. etc. must be condemned. What Major Gen. doing is helping that dictator to come back to ruin our mother land forever. That is my problem.

U r in the wrong side broo. I think u r justifying the act of Rajitha who think prabha is a gentleman and u criticise the people who ended the most dangerous terrorist group in the world. Never mind bcs sometimes the society has some pathetic people like u.

Respecting war hero's one thing promoting dictator and his family is another. Ret. Major Gen. is using his former position to promote corrupt (thrown out) regime for selfish gains. Do not involve mother land on this.

So how abt letting ltte supporters to commemorate prabhakaran and ltte terrorists? are u fine with that? Understand this Mahinda only killed the terrorists, who were responsible for many deaths in our country. And u talking abt murdering journalists which haven't even proven yet in court.  Don't forget broo Ranil Wickramasinghe is the one who said that Sarath Fonseka killed lasantha wickramathunaga...... U R LIVING TODAY BCS OF THE SOLDIERS IN OUR COUNTRY AND ALSO BCS OF MAHINDA WHO GAVE THE ORDER TO ELIMINATE EACH AND EVERY DAMN TERRORISTS, RESPECT THEM!!!!
